description:
Ursula is a rival of Dawn`s that was first introduced at the Akebi Town Pokémon Contest Tournament but it was revealed later on that she participated in the Mikuri Cup at the Lakeside Resort, the tournament Dawn won.
Ursula is a Pokémon Coordinator who`s goal was to defeat Dawn at the Grand Festival. After obtaining the 5 necessary ribbons in order to quality for the event, she managed to advanced past the Appeal round at the Grand Festival and eventually was matched up against Dawn.
name: Urara
